name: Rebel-Like
description:
Rebel-Like is a simple rogue-like game with dungeon crawling.

Current features:

  • Two playable characters
  • Six random generated levels 
  • One boss fight
  • Over 35 items

Planned features:

  • List of collected items
  • Story
  • Progression
  • More levels
  • More Bosses
  • Basically more everything

Controls: WASD to move, Left mouse button to attack, Right mouse button to use character's skill, F11 to hide interface.
